Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Senigallia, Hotel Universal is minutes from Portici Ercolani and Palazzo Mastai. This hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo del Duca and Rocca Roveresca Castle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Universal. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and an elevator (lift). A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided at no charge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Universal. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Centrally located in Senigallia, Hotel Universal is minutes from Portici Ercolani and Palazzo Mastai. This hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo del Duca and Rocca Roveresca Castle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Portici Ercolani - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Palazzo Mastai - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Palazzo del Duca - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Rocca Roveresca Castle - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Rotonda a Mare - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Church of the Brugnetto - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
San Pellegrino Church - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Madonna del Piano - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
La Piaggia Staircase - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Angolo Piazza Il Terreno - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
St. Maria Goretti Sanctuary - 15.7 km / 9.8 mi
Arches of Trajan - 25.9 km / 16.1 mi
Cathedral of San Ciriaco - 26.1 km / 16.2 mi
Diocesan Museum - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi
Vanvitelli's Lazzaretto - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Universal is Ancona (AOI-Falconara) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
